name: Justin Mullins
text: We ordered 3 pizzas and 3 desserts via their website. The pizzas are individual size and would be a large portion if you ate the entire pie. …More

name: Jordan Yoshimine
text: Blaze is one of my fave fast casual concepts.  Price wise so affordable. Building your own pizza is awesome and they have a wide variety of toppings that you would pay a premium for at most pizza joints. It was empty at 915pm on a Thursday night. Everyone needs to eat here!

name: Mindy
text: Pizza was pretty good, especially when it's build your own.  Drinks were sweet but good.  Brown are delicious, good to have it heated, melts the chocolate. Prices are ok for what goes on the pizza.

name: Erik Tye
text: One of my favorite pizza places and you can make it as healthy or decadent as you want. It's served "Chipotle" style where you tell them what you want and they build it in front of you. The employees have always been fun, patient, and warm. …More

name: Denver 303
text: I could not believe how uncooked this pizza was .not only was it falling apart and burn but the taste was discussing. I was told they used two layers of bread that's why it was falling apart . We will never be going back . $30+ for two small pizzas .

name: Jo Momma
text: I came here for a fundraiser. I believe they do a portion of sales because I needed my printed flyer at checkout. This was my first visit although I've been in this shopping area before. This place is in a little strip of shops but has …More

name: Stephanie Hayduk
text:
Omg.
Omg.
I need this in my life back home. Best friggen pizza I have had in a long time! …More

name: Joe V
text: This place is hit or miss.  They can have great pizza and they are very careful with gluten-free order.  The staff can also vary from one extreme to the other.   One of my two order had uncooked crust this week, the other was rubbery.  If …More

name: Ann Skywalker
text: This place is great pizza place! You create your own style of pizza. Wide variety choices of crusts n toppings. The best part is the price n they oven bake the fresh delicious pizza in front of you. This is one of my favorite place to eat. Nice friendly staff n clean too.

name: Brad Smith
text: This is HANDS DOWN, the BEST pizza in the State of Colorado. Nothing compares to the pizza this place makes, the selection of ingredients along with the near lack of any grease makes this pizza perfect. The big chains will never get my …More

name: Troy Callahan
text: I really enjoy the pizza here.

name: Mallory Grieve
text: We ordered delivery of two personal gluten free pizzas our first time here. There were virtually no toppings at all on the pizzas and when we went to eat the pizza, the crust was incredibly floppy; it hadn’t been put in the oven nearly long enough. The flavors were good but not sure if we’ll be back here for the price in the future.

name: Jake David
text: Love this place. Actually wish it wasn't so popular cause this place can get packed. Amazing personal pizzas made to order the way you like. Great staff here as well. They truly are always busting ass.

name: Raymond Dannison
text: Great pizza for the price! Service was especially good. I got a BBQ Chicken and the crust was cooked perfectly and everything tasted fresh. Thanks to Logan and Jack for the excellent and friendly service! I will be returning soon!

name: Nicholas Knueppel
text: This place was wonderful! Good food, maybe a little pricey, but worth it. Every employee paid attention to the details and made sure things were done right. They can make vegan options and the pizza artist even offered to change gloves to make that pizza. Pizza was delicious and the experience was great!

name: Jan Levinsonn
text: This place is GREAT! Super good food, and great customer service. First time in and Anna was super helpful, she told me about the options on the menu and options for crust. Her and Liv made a beautiful pizza for me and I was very happy with my experience, I will definitely be back again!

name: Rebecca Kneipp
text: If you have been to many of these individually made pizza joints you might be a bit jaded!  However I would ask that you reserve judgment and try this lovely place out!  Especially if you have any food issues. I can make a pizza that is one …More

name: Candee Zarah
text: Nice location, great staff. The head staff member communicated our severe food allergy well and made sure clean and new utensils were used to cut the pizza. Well done and everything tastes great!

name: Siddhesh Deshpande
text: Really like the way Pizzas are made here. Similar style like many other pizzerias, but this place has got the x-factor and the vibe of a pizzeria. Nice, thin crusts, so that you can eat all and not throw away the thick bread-ends. Staff is really good and service is quick too

name: Vincent Oletu
text: It's like chipotle for pizza. One price and you can build your own pizza. Cooks in 3 minutes. Had a blast. Wish there was one on Denver proper. I'd eat lunch here often!

name: T Smith
text: Great pizza, especially for the price. Fast and easy and they have drinks you don't find everywhere which I found refreshing. We loved that you could completely customize even the set up options. One pizza fed my husband just fine but was just a little much for me. Just fine as leftovers though. Great spot!

name: Kathy Lorenz
text: Wow!  I love this place.  As a vegan I try to meet my dietary requirements without trying to be a nuisance.  Blaze makes me feel so comfortable.  They offer to do glove changes before making my pie.  Use separate utensils for vegan and meat …More

name: Maddie Green
text: BEST pizza place out there! The quality of the food is amazing, customer service is outstanding, and the environment is great. I would recommend this place to everybody!

name: Austin Wesolick
text: Love this place! I wasnt expecting too much out of it since I've been to other similar chains but this place blew me away. The food is always great and very filling. The garlic knots are awesome! (Sauce not as much). Would highly recommend …More

name: J. Wagoner
text: I’ve been to this location about 10 times now.  The employees are always super-nice and they do a great job with the pizza.  I do wish they didn’t put the metal numbers on top of my pizza while cooking it, but I don’t like anything on/in my …More

name: kailee van tine
text: Always love this place. Best gluten free crust I've found! Customizing your pizza is the best way to go

name: chris hammond
text: Very solid spot. I would equate it to the "qdoba's" of the world. It's not going to wow you but the food is quality and relatively fast, the staff are friendly, and the place is neat. I had the meat eater pizza (pro tip: add ranch to it) which was tasty. Good place for lunch for quick dinner.

name: Jason Willan
text: The pizza is really delicious and you can have as many toppings as you want. My kids love going there and watching their Pizza being created before their eyes. Really fast and has always been clean. delicious!

name: Patrick McGarvey
text: The pizza is delicious. The price is great for unlimited toppings. No extra charge for vegan cheese. And the staff is super friendly. I wish there was one closer to me.

name: Regina
text: Today was the first time I tried Blaze Pizza. Tim helped my friend and I and explained everything thoroughly. He was so friendly and patient! The pizza came out pretty quickly. I thought it was delicious and fresh. I love that there is vegan cheese for no extra charge and plenty of veggie options. I will definitely return!

name: Nate Scherer
text: Delicious very thin crust (though option for thicker if desired) pizza baked very fast. Good desserts such as brownies, warmed at the edge of the oven. This particular location has Blue Sky soda and other interesting drinks.

name: Aaron Kornmueller
text: Honestly some of the best pizza around...well worth the money. Not the fastest place to go but the freshest. If you haven't been its well worth going

name: Keith Miller
text: Great service and pizza. I have been to Blaze Pizza all over the country. I really like Blaze Pizza and it really is better then the competition. How ever at this location 2 of the 3 employees on the front line were really grumpy and I …More

name: Jennifer S
text: They have great quick pizza. You can order from their pizza combos on list, customize anything about the pizza on their list or make up your own from scratch. Reasonably priced as a mom of 3. 1 topping is less then $7 and good amt for my 2 kids under age of 6, or 1 person solo. Pizza is done quick too.

name: chris davidson
text: Absolutely love this place, from the great pizza to the awesome employees.  Specifically Maddy and Nate they take care of me every time. And i guess i even like that Santos guy they have as a manager.

name: L. A.
text: Our family really enjoys Blaze. The price is great and the quality is good. My 3 year old loves being able to pick what's on his pizza. No matter what time we go, service is fact and friendly and the dining area is well-maintained. …More

name: Chris Mrowca
text: First time at blaze pizza and the food and service was excellent. Nate was very efficient  and very friendly, great customer service. I will be coming back a lot more often.

name: David S
text: A make your own personal pizza shop, they have a great friendly staff, options for both thin and thick crust and they don't charge per topping. …More

name: Dave Beckwith
text: They serve up pizzas very quickly with any  custom combination of toppings you choose. Mine took about 7 minutes (thin crust),  and only cost $7.95 plus tax for a good pizza just the right size for one person.

name: Derrick Gardner
text: Great value. Amazing service. Was very pleasantly surprised at this new take on pizza. Cannot believe they will let you put as many toppings as you want on your pizza! Will definitely be coming back again!

name: Lyn Carole
text: New app makes it so easy to pre order...and have it ready  When you get there. On my visit in January, I was using a reward for a free pizza and had placed my order online. When I got here wasn't quite what I expected, (fat fingers missed …More

name: Ronnie Order
text: Great place!  Low cost pizzas with standard price, regardless; includes whatever toppings you want.  Staff is friendly, and this,business supports educational organizations.

name: Christian Winchester
text: Very pleased to have Blaze Pizza in Toledo. Build your own pizza without a great variety of topping options including fresh veggies and at least half a dozen cheese and meat options, all for less than $10, regardless of number of toppings. …More

name: Jonathan Kloster
text: Fantastic pizza. Gentleman (new guy) who prepared our pizzas was hilariously entertaining. Left very satisfied after getting the pesto sauce with almost everything as toppings

name: Greg Owen
text: Good pizza.  Service is off compared to MOD Pizza.  Overall Mod Pizza is better for pizza, service and they serve beer and wine.  Blaze does not.  You'll have a better experience at Mod Pizza..

name: Melissa Anderson` DiGiovanni
text: Had lunch here and was very impressed with the professionalism of the staff as well as the pizza. I wasn't expecting such a wonderful experience, but Blaze Pizza surprised me. If you like a little heat, you have to try the spicy sauce.

name: GnarlyNar
text: The vegan options here were pretty good. Most people got there pizza pretty quickly hut, my pizza was given to someone else and i waited about 30 minutes to eat. So I gave it 3 stars because it was all a bit disorganized and sloppy. The food was just alright as well.

name: Ann Marie
text: We love Blaze Pizza,  get taste,  lots of topping choices.   As with any place to eat don't go if you are in a hurry on the weekend evenings.  There website dies show you there busiest times.

name: Zachariah Milligan
text: Absolutely the best idea for a pizza parlor ever. The crust was flaky and flavorful. They have plenty of options for meats and veggies, and the price was very reasonable for the amount of food you get. The service was fast and accurate, and the restaurant was neat and clean.

name: Michael Pelshaw
text: Good food and service. Very fair prices as well. Would have given 5 stars, but we were in line for quite a while and it wasnt that busy.

name: Jason Lihani
text: I went to Blaze for the first time this week and WOW. Super awesome experience. Everyone behind the counter had the best attitude of any similar style restaurant. (I'm so sorry I didn't grab any of your names!) They were totally happy …More

name: Ron Farrell
text:
Delicious. Fast. Friendly. Great value.
Highly recommend!

name: Ricci Jo Martinez
text: Great pizza and salads. However dont eat there on a cold day its always freezing in there. Or bring your coat, scarf and gloves.

name: Tom Shelly
text: I love this idea of quick service one price pizza! Delicious and quick. Good beverage selection as well.

name: Charity Nelson
text: Husband and I come here a few times a month. Always excellent food and service, and we highly recommend it. Never been disappointed. Service is always fast regardless of how busy it is. Staff are pleasant to converse with and are always down to chat while making the pizzas. Best pizza place in Broomfield, I'd say.

name: Carole Pyle
text: This is the BEST pizza place around. I am gluten and dairy free and they still have options for me that come out amazing. The blood a range lemonade is so great

name: Heidi Lacy Olive
text: The Pizza is delicious. Thankful for an abundance of options. The most pleasing part of our visit was how engaged and interactive the staff was with my husband and I. I am so accustomed to being treated like I am inconveniencing millenial …More

name: Matt Burgess
text: Stopped by for the first time today after seeing all the good reviews. Not much more to say that hasn't been said. I really like that they don't charge by the topping so load it up!

name: Tung Nguyen
text: I enjoyed having dinner here tonight. Unlimited topping is awesome.  I loaded up my pizza for the same price.

name: Colton Carter
text: A make your own pizza spot with a huge selection of cheese, meats and veggies. Gluten free crusts are available and the staff is very understanding of ACTUAL allergies. Service is quick and painless. Will be coming back again after my long runs ;)

name: Gary Hayes
text: Nice atmosphere, pizza is good.  build your own with lots of selection.  Open later than many other high quality fast food.   Wish Cream Cheese was an option, and wish they served beer.

name: Christian B
text: After entering, we all lined up and began to order our specialty pizzas. Oh the joys of seeing the dough being pressed, the sauce and topping applied and then into the stone fired pizza oven they went. One by one we were called when our …More

name: Anna Platek
text: Every time I come in the folks working are really pleasant and always have an answer when I ask for a recommendation. Lately I've been living the white sauce on my pizzas. So tasty!

name: Mariella Laws
text: Our waitress was so great! So nice, so funny, welcoming, and she was busy, we were not her only table, and she was awesome!

name: Laura Whittemore
text: LOVE THIS PLACE!  UNIQUE with quality ingredients and you can get whatever you want on it.

name: Amber Tucker
text: Wood fire pizza. You can add as many toppings as you like with no extra charge. The ingredients seem fresh. The agua fresca is a nice change from sugary drinks or plain water.

name: Matthew Bradford
text: Great energy and attitudes! Food is delicious and very well priced! Definitely looking forward to more of them popping up in the Denver area!

name: Jeanna Woods
text: For the most time they make delicious pizza! Truly fresh ingredients and Fire Grilled Pizza.

name: Ryan Anderson
text: Always love this place. Great food for a decent price. The employees are pretty cool people and very helpful

name: Jennifer Newmann
text: Great experience! Fantastic Happy they have gluten free and dairy free options.

name: Moises LeBaron
text:
grate pizza, and grate price
every thing is fresh and you can build your own pizza with unlimited topping.. all how you like it! it's amazing! our familys favorite pizza place ever. we are hooked.

name: Evie Croft
text: I love Blaze because they offer the vegan cheese that I need for my dairy allergy. Their dough does not have eggs, which i am also allergic to. The pizza is delicious, service is fast, there are tons of toppings and choices, great prices, awesome rewards program, and super friendly workers.

name: Kyle Deuschle
text: Really great food with fresh ingredients and a cool atmosphere! Only downside was that it took about 10 minutes of standing in line before we even made our pizza and then another 5 minutes to make it and cook it. So be prepared to spend about 10-20 minutes in the store. Would highly recommend though!

name: Robin Sterner Reddick
text: Fast, delicious, fresh ingredients and made to order just as you like it. Easy parking as well.

name: Mike Craig
text: I love pizza and Blaze is easily my fast casual favorite. I regularly introduce and send people to Blaze ... and never regret it!

name: Liz Oschmann
text: I have always love this pizza place, and choose to come to it versus the various others by my house. The only time that I will walk back out is if “Mr. T” is there. He is very frustrating, to say the least, to watch make your pizza, is very …More

name: Rebecca Scull
text: Choose your own toppings for $8!! Great deal, great pizza. Nice atmosphere,  friendly staff.

name: Peter Vang
text: Pizza is delicious! Quickly make the pizza right in front of you. Very spacious and service was amazing!

name: Karan Goenka
text: Always loved blaze Pizza. Yummy pizza and not very heavy on pocket. Build your own is the best !

name: Jay Kim
text: The pizza here was pretty good and the agua fresca drinks were great.  The set up on how you order and have it made in front of you is cool, but when it gets busy it also can cause some delays.  Also if you get the double dough, make note …More

name: Heather M
text: The pizza is made quickly, it's delicious. Subway for pizza but you don't get charged extra. I'd recommend asking for extra cheese, and in case you're wondering their spicy sauce isn't that spicy but it does warm your mouth quite a bit.

name: Ryan Ruta
text: Excellent wood fired pizza at a reasonable price. Make your own pizza by going through the line and adding exactly what you want.  Less than 10 minutes later,  your pizza is ready.

name: Gail Gowen
text: I tried this place out because my friend recommended it. The pizza here is really good. I got the Art Likeovers and then as I was going down the line added on several more veggies for free.

name: Craig Pfeiffer
text: Good pizza with lots of options.  Service was fast and friendly.  $3.14 pizza on pi day.  👍

name: Mark Lawrence
text: Sensational late lunch w s'mores dessert. Awesome

name: Corey Nead
text: Was hoping to like this place. Got a couple of pizzas togo. Pizzas were sitting there for who knows how long when we arrived. Not very hot. Kale salad had seen better days regarding freshness.

name: Lisa Carter
text: Blaze Pizza serves the best pizza in town. Great options on the menu (which can be modified- add or remove ingredients at no extra charge) or choose to build your own. Very reasonable prices. Welcoming and clean atmosphere. Different and …More

name: Gina L
text: We used to love this place, but they can't get our order right every time we place an online order. It defeats the whole purpose of ordering ahead of time to save time....

name: Patrick Carpenter
text: Always a great atmosphere. Employees are friendly and always create my pizza just the way I ask. Also the build your own pizza for 8 bucks I think is great.

name: Tim Kordik
text: Horrible and SLOW experience today. Took 20+ minutes to get through a line of 8 people while the staff was chatting it up with teenage customers. Pizza came out burnt. I liked this location but this is the last time I will ever come here again. Shame. I will be going to Mod from now on.

name: Starbby
text: Exceptional pizza, one size, no brainer ordering. Great toppings and multiple sauces/cheese to choose from. Daiya  (Vegan) cheese is offered along with a Gluten-free crust! …More

name: Verne Ironwing
text: Good pizza! Usually fast service

name: Miaforte
text: Overall good pizza. Stingy with the artichokes. They took one small piece a broke it into smaller bits. Weird.

name: Alex Thompson
text: 10/10 Amazing. You won't be disappointed

name: David Ohara
text: The fresh dough and toppings help alot from blaze

name: chris meth
text: Pizza isn't that great and the service is just ok. But it is a very trendy atmosphere. If you're more worried about looking cool than how your food tastes, this is the place for you.

name: Colt Summers
text: It's like a Chipotle or Qdoba except for with pizza! Take all the toppings you want for 8 bucks and a drink makes it 10. Absolutely delicious thin crispy crust. I'm a fan and I'll be back.

name: Rhett Dooley
text: Good personal pizzas with a large variety of toppings. Decently priced. Good lunch option.

name: adam nystrom
text: The worst business model I've ever seen!! They REFUSED to take my order on the phone and told me to go online and use the app even though I'm driving and that's not only dangerous but illegal. I told him i was driving and was told to call …More

name: Eric Landes
text: Could split the Build your own.  Well worth it.

name: Katie Lunder
text: Love this place, first tried it in Asheville, NC a couple weeks ago, had it here last week.  Good fresh ingredients and it's delicious. My only complaint is that I wasn't told about the rewards program so I missed out on accumulating points because of this both times.

name: Johnny Mansanti
text:
The chipotle of pizza, pick whatever you want on your za and they throw it in the super hot oven.
The food was excellent (I should know, i picked out all the toppings ;)) what's …More

name: Maggie Michael
text: Pizza was great, employees were great but that could not take away from the fact that I have never witnessed a bigger bully of a manager. Louis yelled at multiple employees who simply we're trying to do their job. Since he tried to do all …More

name: Kandie Angel
text: Omg, amazing!! I just have to say they had the best pizza I have ever had. The food is amazing, and the service was fast as ever!! I recommend this place to everyone!!

name: Debi Alvidrez
text: Great place!! Pizza was good, service was on point.

name: Ben H
text: Blaze Pizza has always had consistently delicious pizza. You can make your own personal pizza with unlimited toppings so that you can make it how YOU like it!! The staff is always very friendly as well. A+++ I consider it to be the best pizza in Broomfield and surrounding areas!

name: robert bontempi
text:
Close by
Quick service
Suase and toppings very good. …More

name: Heather McNay
text: Great pizza place! Love that you can add as many toppings as your want for no extra cost.

name: John Lopez
text: Great place to have pizza great customer service

name: Jocelyn Wilson
text: Loved this place sooo much, I went in on Tuesday and came back Thursday just because of the fantastic duo Natalia and Caden! Their fun hats, fantastic customer service skills, and great energy they both have makes this place not only fun …More

name: Paul Adams
text: Friendly staff, great ingredients made in front of you Subway style! What else do you want. Get some pizza.

name: bog ulatow
text: Very good make you own pizza.

name: Solace Dragon
text: The idea of Blaze Pizza is brilliant. It's not your typical pizza place. It is perfect for people who want to see something new in town. Think of it as a hybrid between Subway and Pizza.

name: Kelsey Fox
text: Delicious pizza and friendly staff!

name: Christopher Jones
text: First time in and presentation of toppings was perfect, the staff are helpful in letting you know all the delicious  options, and the place is clean. A must for a quick bite.

name: Nels Lindahl
text: Great single person pizza with build your own topping selection...

name: Alex Burgos
text: You can pile on the toppings and it's quick. Pretty good price for the size of the  pizza. Would recommend for your pizza fix.

name: Nicolette Kamerzell
text: This place is great. Fast, always friendly, and tasty. Would absolutely recommend.

name: Patrick Ford
text: Try this place if you haven't. Go HERE for your next pizza. Crust is very good for a fast restaraunt, sauce is tasty, toppings high quality. It tastes very good, you won't be disappointed.

name: Helen Littlejohn
text: Best pizza in town, super good and friendly service

name: Leigh Ann Mitchell
text: Love being able to personalize my pizza! Spicy pizza  sauce is awesome.

name: Sarah Erickson
text: Soo...  good! Quick and friendly service, tons of topping choices

name: K Morse
text: Friendly staff and Manager. Pizza was delicious. Clean and pleasant place.

name: Bob Xiong
text: Great customer service and food was decently quick. There's lots of options. The order of the food finishing is really random, mine went in the fireplace after the two people behind me.

name: nomadic youtz
text: Try blaze for the first time. The young man who helped us was nice and very helpful ,the pizza was full of favor, tasted good both hot and cold. I will be telling all our friends and family

name: Albert Wolfram
text: Awesome pizza with whatever toppings you want fire blazed! Also, has great selection of soft drinks.

name: David Lee
text: Staff is friendly and efficient. They can assemble and cook your pizza in just a few minutes. The crust I chose (thin) was cooked exactly the way I like it. There were tons of high quality toppings to choose from. The beverage station had some tasty Agua Frescas. I'll be returning here for sure.

name: zaxby
text: Pretty awesome place. Pizza is okay but staff is very friendly, and the price is good.

name: Jonathan Bosse
text: Came here for the vegan pizza, it was good but we ran into some problems. First they gave my pizza away to someone else and wouldnt listen when I tried to inform them off it. Then they gave me a voucher for a free pizza except I qas only in …More

name: Alena Morciglio
text: Really freindly, fast, and super great pizza. Definitely my favorite place ♡

name: Dan Mowinski
text: Great food!  However right now they do not have beer,  so that was a disappointment because it showed beer when you walk in.

name: Matthew C
text: Always delicious! Great place for a quick build-your-own pizza!

text: Delicious pizza, Build your own with unilimited toppings with various choices of sauces. Go and enjoy,

name: Haylie Weston
text: Delicious pizza and lemonade! The whole family loved it.

name: Jesse Pryor
text: Once you walk in the place, the aroma hits you right in the face! (In a good way) Love that they have vegan options for pizza as well.

name: Hardy B.
text: Great pizza and toppings and their juices and drink concoctions are always delicious.

name: Dirk Davidson
text: Really delicious pizza, at least the one I make for myself Everytime. High rise dough with most all of the ingredients.

name: Desirae Noftz
text: I was so happy with my experience! The staff was helpful and friendly!

name: Jason Finger
text: Great pizza.  Nice prices.  Friendly staff.  My favorite pizza place.

name: Canderella Naturella
text: We are very impressed with this pizza joint. We always get the build your own pizza, which can be made vegan and/or gluten free! Yum! They have an amazing spicy sauce and they also have daiya cheese! You can choose from probably 15-20 …More

name: Alaa Sawaged
text: Amazing food with a really nice and fun staff. Pizzas are perfect and it's not expensive at all.

name: P Johnson
text: First time visit. Employees and food great.  Atmosphere really loud

name: Claire Stephens
text: Delicious and amazing and the service spectacular!

name: Shawn Hiniker
text: This place is as good if not a little better than your average build your own pie place.  I enjoy the meat lovers, and they always put on extra sauce no charge.

name: Pam Alonzo
text: Fresh ingredients, fast service, and Great tasting pizza!!

name: Tom Willet
text: Tasty. Custom. Made to order. Fast. Love it!

text: Excellent!! Love the pesto sauce and always have friendly staff

name: Jamie Jones
text: Yummmmmmmmmmm.... and the kids that work in there are fun and kind. It's great

name: Mich M
text: I went with my daughter for the first time and we loved it. The food was fantastic!

name: Delilah Nethken
text: I ordered online from work. I walked up to the cashier just like their sign says. I was completely ignored by all the staff members behind the counter. I finally got the attention of a young man behind the counter who didn't know what to do …More

name: Barb Worster
text: Really good "build your own". Choices of sauces are good. Not your usual take out!

name: Dally D
text: Love Blaze Pizza, the gluten free crust is yummy and they have tons of toppings to choose from!

text: I'll come back here for the tasty pizza you can make any way you like. Easy to find and the food is made quickly

name: Will Tucker

name: pinkpenguin28
text: It's not as friendly as it was. Felt like i was asking too much. Just cos my daughther wanted light sauce..

name: Matthew Kyle
text: Great food, wonderful toppings, even better price. Can't go wrong.

name: Troy Herman
text: Friendly staff and great pizza - crust is awesomely light and crispy!  Bakes in 5 minutes.

name: Doug Morton

name: Dean Lujan
text: My wife and i went to Blaze pizza in Henderson Nv. We will definitely try this location everything was freshly made with fresh veggies and meat, and the service was very good also.

name: John Vogt
text: Excellent Pizza, not heavy tasting like most chain places. Unlimited toppings for $8.

name: Maroon729 !

name: Deborah Vieth

text: So far so good. The service is great and the food is fresh.

name: John Jefferson
text: Amazing pizza customization, delicious toppings, very affordable, excellent customer service and their lemonades are so yummy (blood orange lemonade is my favorite!!!)

name: Ed Sadiković
text: Although this is a chain, the pizza is actually well done and the dough is, in my personal opinion, better than at some of the other build your own pizza places in the area.

name: Dan Felt
text: Absolutely love this place.  Always awesome.

name: Logan Bunch
text: Pizza was mediocre. Slightly burnt. Sauce was meh..

name: John Krueger
text: Fun experience and good pizza. Staff was super cool.

name: Ben Nelsen
text: This style of pizza place is popping up all over. Blaze has the best gluten free crust and friendly staff.

name: neil tottle
text: Great pizza, friendly engaging staff, All around a great experience.

name: Darla Arians
text: Fresh ingredients, friendly service, quick turnaround!

name: Chris Kelly
text: I love the one price for as many toppings as you want model and their spicy sauce is perfect!

name: Justin Kever
text: Really great value and vegan options available. I like the simple pie with the balsamic finish.

name: L IH
text: Excited when I walked through the door and started building my pizza order... by the time I sat down to wait I was utterly disgusted with the full length beards, the two working wore no facial netting or barriers. Eewww

text: Love this place, I can build my own pizza, and it is fast

name: Jacob Schuman

Carrier out takes a while because they make the pizza once you arrive.
